name: Princeless
description: Princeless is a student project by first year students at Nord University in Norway, under the name "Shady Productions".  The theme for the semestar was tribute,  where we had to choose a game that was older than the oldest person on our team and come up with a game idea from there. Princeless is best enjoyed with a controller, and is targeted at young teens and up, though players of all ages can play!
